column5: Just thought I'd share this video, there is some amazing footage in the trailer, I hope the show airs in Canada: http://www.youtube.com/watch_popup?v=2HiUMlOz4UQ&vq=large  Enjoy, Shaun
looks amazing! The guys at the waterfall there....what a shot
I can't wait for this to air!  Here's a sneak peak I saw on a different website.  These guys take ice fishing to a whole new level
